author: Giulia R.
text: Ho avuto il piacere di esplorare Napoli con Claudia come guida, e l’esperienza è stata indimenticabile. Claudia, nata e cresciuta in questa vibrante città, conosce ogni angolo e ci ha portato in luoghi autentici e poco conosciuti dai turisti. La sua passione per Napoli è contagiosa e la sua professionalità rende ogni visita unica. Grazie alla sua competenza e gentilezza, ogni momento è stato piacevole e istruttivo. Consiglio vivamente Claudia a chiunque voglia scoprire il vero cuore di Napoli!

author: Marco B.
text: La mia esperienza con Claudia a Napoli è stata fantastica. Non solo ci ha mostrato i principali luoghi turistici, ma ci ha anche guidato attraverso esperienze autentiche e locali, come piccole botteghe, ristoranti tipici e scorci nascosti della città. Claudia è preparata, gentile e sempre attenta alle esigenze dei suoi clienti. Consiglio vivamente di affidarsi a lei per vivere Napoli come un vero napoletano.

author: Rosa Bologna
text: I had the pleasure of experiencing Naples with Claudia as my guide, and it was nothing short of exceptional. Born and raised in this vibrant city, Claudia's passion for Naples is contagious. She brings a unique perspective with her in-depth local knowledge, taking you to hidden local gems and authentic eateries that most tourists would never find. Beyond her love for sharing the true essence of her hometown, Claudia has a keen interest in learning about other cultures and countries, as well as a deep passion for the English language, which she has studied for some time. Her work as a translator adds to her exceptional communication skills, making every interaction smooth and enjoyable. If you're a lover of nature and animals, Claudia shares these passions and can customise your trip with unique experiences in Naples that reflect these interests. If you want to see the heart of Naples through the eyes of someone who truly embodies its spirit, Claudia is the guide to choose!

author: 3 Girardo
text: I met Claudia through the web site Conversation Exchange. When I decided to take Italian lessons in Naples we were able to meet in person. Naples is Claudia’s home and she made a generous offer to show me around. The first place that we went was the island of Procida. This was really helpful to me as I might not have tried to go that far from Naples on my own and if I did I would probably have restricted myself to walking around the area near the ferry port. However with Claudia’s help I visited the Palazzo D’Avalos which was a lordly residence and hunting reserve that became a prison. Additionally, we took a public bus around the island; stopping at an interesting and panoramic beach side bar. In Naples the language school provided tours of the Centro Storico (historic center), Spaccanapoli, Via Toledo and Piazza Plebiscito; so Claudia decided to take me beyond these primary tourist places. First we went to Vomero. This journey was interesting enough in that we started off in a cable car and made our way to an amazing park with a wonderful view overlooking Naples. But what also was interesting was discovering this different and upscale part of Naples. In Vomero, Claudia brought me to an excellent and inexpensive restaurant where I am sure I was the only tourist. Next we went to Lungomare Mergellina and Chiaia and again I was able to see a different style of Naples. In all of these different places, I began to think, these are places I could stay if I ever came back to Naples. Our final journey was again outside Naples to Pozzuoli and Campo Flegrei. These are definite must see place when seeing Naples but without a knowledgeable guide they would be almost impossible to reach. I must say that my time in Naples was greatly enhanced because of Claudia’s efforts and all the kindness she showed me.

author: Simone
text: Wir haben unsere 4-tägige Städtereise mit der freundlichen und zuvorkommenden Reiseführerin Claudia Festa verbracht. Gleich am ersten Tag hat sie uns am Hauptbahnhof von Neapel abgeholt und sich wunderbar um uns gekümmert. Sie hat uns zu unserem Hotel begleitet und uns danach die Innenstadt von Neapel gezeigt. Ihr Wissen war einzigartig, da sie gebürtige Neapolitanerin ist. Sie hat uns am Abend in eine der besten Pizzerien von Neapel geführt und uns dann wohlbehalten bei unserem Hotel abgesetzt. Die folgenden Tage vergingen wie im Flug. Da wir sehr an der Unterwelt Neapels interessiert sind, hat sie uns in die Galleria Borbonica und die Katakomben gebracht. Das Mittagessen war ein einmaliges Erlebnis bei einem kleinen, aber fantastischen Restaurant, in dem es außer uns nicht einen Touristen gab. Die Zeit verging wie im Flug. Wir haben den Botanischen Garten, das Meer und noch viele andere Dinge gesehen. Das Tollste an Claudias Begleitung war, dass sie uns genau das gezeigt hat, an was wir am meisten interessiert waren. Und das war die Unterwelt von Neapoli. Ich kann Claudia wegen ihrer freundlichen und natürlichen Art höchstens empfehlen!

author: Anna L.
text: Unsere Reise durch Neapel mit Claudia war einfach wunderbar. Sie hat uns nicht nur zu den bekannten Sehenswürdigkeiten geführt, sondern auch versteckte Orte gezeigt, die wir alleine nie gefunden hätten. Claudia ist äußerst kompetent, freundlich und sorgt dafür, dass jeder Ausflug angenehm und unvergesslich wird. Ihre Leidenschaft für ihre Stadt ist spürbar und macht die Reise zu einem besonderen Erlebnis. Wir können Claudia als Reiseführerin nur wärmstens empfehlen.

author: Lukas M.
